text: Constanta Airline is an airline based in Zaporizhia, Ukraine. It operates charter flights from Ukraine's main airports to Europe, Russia and the CIS. Its main base is Zaporizhia International Airport, Zaporizhia, with hubs at Kiev-Zhulyany Airport, Kiev, Kharkiv International Airport and Sumy Airport. == History == The airline was established by Eugene Kozenko and started operations on 1 June 1994. It was formerly known as Zaporozhye Aviation Enterprise.
